prediction.title: Prediction form
prediction.modelTooltip:
Logistic Regression ‚Äî basic linear model, shows the impact of each indicator.
Random Forest ‚Äî ensemble of decision trees, robust to noise.
XGBoost ‚Äî powerful boosting for tabular data.
LightGBM ‚Äî fast gradient boosting implementation.
SVM ‚Äî finds optimal boundary between classes.
KNN ‚Äî compares with similar patients (neighbors).
Neural Network (MLP) ‚Äî detects complex nonlinear relationships.

underweight.label: Underweight
underweight.explanation: Body mass is below the recommended norm.

normal.label: Normal
normal.explanation: BMI is in the healthy range of 18.5‚Äì24.9.

overweight.label: Overweight
overweight.explanation: The indicator exceeds the norm. It is recommended to pay attention to nutrition and activity.

obesity1.label: Obesity I
obesity1.explanation: The level corresponds to first-degree obesity.

normal.label: Normal
normal.explanation: Systolic pressure is within safe level (<120 mmHg).

elevated.label: Elevated
elevated.explanation: Upper pressure 120‚Äì129 mmHg ‚Äî important to monitor.

hypertension2.label: Hypertension Stage 2
hypertension2.explanation: Systolic pressure ‚â• 140 mmHg. Medical consultation needed.

normal.label: Normal
normal.explanation: Diastolic pressure is within safe level (<80 mmHg).

prediabetes.label: Elevated (prediabetes)
prediabetes.explanation: Glucose in the range of 100‚Äì125 mg/dL.

borderline.label: Borderline level
borderline.explanation: Cholesterol 200‚Äì239 mg/dL. It is important to monitor nutrition.

RIDAGEYR.name: Age
RIDAGEYR.desc: Participant age in full years. Helps understand age-related risks.

BMXBMI.name: Body Mass Index (BMI)
BMXBMI.desc: Calculated as mass divided by the square of height. Over 25 indicates overweight.

BPXSY1.name: Systolic pressure
BPXSY1.desc: Upper blood pressure reading (pressure during heart contraction).

BPXDI1.name: Diastolic pressure
BPXDI1.desc: Lower blood pressure reading (pressure during heart relaxation).

LBXGLU.name: Fasting glucose
LBXGLU.desc: Measured on an empty stomach. Helps detect prediabetes and diabetes.

LBXTC.name: Total cholesterol
LBXTC.desc: Total cholesterol level in blood. Important for assessing cardiovascular risk.

tooltips.BMXBMI: Body Mass Index (kg/m¬≤). Over 30 may indicate obesity.
tooltips.BPXSY1: Systolic blood pressure (upper value) in mmHg.
tooltips.BPXDI1: Diastolic blood pressure (lower value) in mmHg.

status.title: API Status
status.allSystemsOperationalMessage: We have not detected any issues affecting our systems.
status.someSystemsDegradedMessage: We have detected performance issues in some systems.
status.someSystemsUnavailableMessage: We have detected issues affecting our systems.
status.allServicesRestored: All affected services are now fully restored.

descriptions.auth_change-password: Change password for logged in user
descriptions.api_chats_users: List of all users for chats
descriptions.auth_change_password: Change password for logged in user

detailed.health: Service health check. Returns information about API status, list of available routes and general service information. Used for monitoring and checking API availability.
detailed.system_database_stats: Get database statistics. Provides information about record count, user activity, database size and other database performance metrics.
detailed.metadata: API and machine learning model metadata. Returns information about available target variables, parameter schema for prediction, model versions and their characteristics.
detailed.predict: Health risk prediction based on input parameters. Accepts user health data and target variable, returns risk probability and recommendations. Uses calibrated champion machine learning models.
detailed.explain: Model explanation via permutation importance. Analyzes the impact of each parameter on the prediction result, allowing to understand which factors most influence the risk.
detailed.health-risk_latest: Get the latest saved risk prediction for the current user. Returns the newest entry from prediction history with full information about results.
detailed.auth_register: Register a new user in the system. Creates a new account with email, password and personal data validation. Returns JWT token for further authentication.
detailed.auth_login: Login. Verifies user email and password, returns JWT access token and user profile information for authenticated requests.
detailed.auth_logout: Logout. Ends the current user session. On the client, the access token is removed from localStorage.
detailed.auth_change-password: Change password for logged in user. Requires current password and new password with confirmation. Ensures security through current password verification.
detailed.auth_forgot-password: Password recovery request. Generates a secure token for password reset and sends instructions to user's email. Token is valid for 24 hours.
detailed.auth_reset-password: Set new password via recovery token. Accepts token from email and new password, updates user password in database.
detailed.auth_me: Get current authenticated user profile. Returns full user information including email, name, date of birth, avatar and other personal data.
detailed.auth_history: Get user prediction history via auth router. Returns list of recent predictions with detailed information about each prediction.
detailed.users_me: Get and update user profile. Supports GET for retrieval and PUT/PATCH for profile data updates. Allows changing name, last name, date of birth and other fields.
detailed.users_me_avatar: Upload and delete user avatar. POST allows uploading image (PNG, JPG, JPEG), DELETE removes uploaded avatar and returns to generated one.
detailed.users_me_password: Change user password. Updates password in account with minimum length and security validation.
detailed.users_me_delete: Delete user account. Deletes all user data including prediction history, password recovery tokens and uploaded avatar. Action is irreversible.
detailed.users_me_history: Get user prediction history. Returns list of predictions with detailed information about target variables, models, probabilities and creation dates.
detailed.users_me_history_stats: User prediction statistics for charts. Provides aggregated data about predictions: distribution by target variables, risk levels, models and time series for visualization.
detailed.users_me_history_prediction_id: Delete specific prediction history entry. Allows user to delete individual prediction from their history.
detailed.users_history: User prediction history (legacy endpoint). Deprecated route, used for compatibility with older client versions.
detailed.users_history_stats: Prediction statistics (legacy endpoint). Deprecated route for getting statistics, replaced by /users/me/history/stats.
detailed.users_user_id_block: Block user by another user. Allows blocking another user, which hides them from chat list and prevents receiving messages from them.
detailed.users_user_id_unblock: Unblock user. Cancels previous blocking, restoring ability to interact with user.
detailed.assistant_chat: Chat with health AI assistant. Accepts user message, analyzes context from prediction history and provides personalized health recommendations through LLM (Ollama).
detailed.assistant_history: AI assistant message history. Returns recent messages from assistant chat, allowing to restore conversation context.
detailed.assistant_health: Check Ollama server status. Tests LLM service availability and performance, measures latency and returns detailed service status information.
detailed.api_chats: List of chats between users. Returns all active chats of current user with information about last messages, unread messages and pin status.
detailed.api_chats_users: List of all users for creating chats. Provides list of active system users with information about their profiles and blocking status for choosing interlocutor.
detailed.api_chats_unread-count: Unread messages count. Returns total number of unread messages for current user in all chats.
detailed.api_chats_chat_uuid: Specific chat details by UUID. Gets full chat information including all messages, interlocutor data and automatically marks messages as read.
detailed.api_chats_chat_uuid_messages: Send message to chat. Creates new message in chat between two users with access and blocking validation.
detailed.api_chats_chat_uuid_read: Mark messages as read. Updates status of all unread messages in chat, marking them as read by current user.
detailed.api_chats_chat_uuid_pin: Pin or unpin chat. Allows pinning important chats at the top of the list for quick access.
detailed.api_chats_reorder: Reorder chats. Updates chat display order in list according to user settings.
detailed.health_risk_latest: Get the latest saved risk prediction for the current user. Returns the newest entry from prediction history with full information about results.
detailed.auth_change_password: Change password for logged in user. Requires current password and new password with confirmation. Ensures security through current password verification.
detailed.auth_forgot_password: Password recovery request. Generates a secure token for password reset and sends instructions to user's email. Token is valid for 24 hours.
detailed.auth_reset_password: Set new password via recovery token. Accepts token from email and new password, updates user password in database.
detailed.api_chats_unread_count: Unread messages count. Returns total number of unread messages for current user in all chats.

keyFactors.title: Key factors that influenced the risk:

low.1: Continue to maintain a healthy lifestyle

medium.1: It is recommended to consult a doctor
medium.2: Undergo additional examinations to clarify the condition
medium.3: Pay attention to factors affecting the risk
medium.4: Consider the possibility of lifestyle correction

high.1: Immediately consult a doctor for a detailed examination
high.3: Discuss a treatment and prevention plan with your doctor
high.4: Follow all recommendations of medical personnel

footer.description: HealthRisk.AI ‚Äî automated health risk assessment and prediction system using artificial intelligence methods.
footer.disclaimer: This report is not a medical diagnosis and does not replace a doctor's consultation.

profileOverview.title: Your Profile: Key Indicators
profileOverview.subtitle: Comparison of last entered values with recommended limits for a healthy person.
profileOverview.note: Colors indicate whether the indicator is within normal, warning, or risk zone.
profileOverview.empty: To see personal diagrams, first calculate risks on the "Prediction Form" page.

riskComparison.title: Risks by Model
riskComparison.subtitle: Comparison of calculated diabetes and obesity risks for your profile.
riskComparison.note: Risks are displayed as percentages, where the full scale corresponds to 100%.
riskComparison.empty: Calculate diabetes and obesity risks to see the comparison.

factors.title: Factor Importance
factors.subtitle: Indicators that most influenced the last prediction. Hover to read explanations.
factors.note: Positive values indicate a greater influence of the factor on increasing risk.
factors.empty: Top factors will appear after the first successful prediction.

bmi.title: BMI Distribution in Sample
bmi.subtitle: Shows what percentage of people from the NHANES sample are in each body mass category.
bmi.note: Compare your BMI with typical population values.

bp.title: Blood Pressure Categories
bp.subtitle: Proportion of people with different blood pressure levels in the dataset.
bp.note: "Normal" ‚Äî up to 120/80 mmHg, "Hypertension Stage 2" ‚Äî 140/90 mmHg and above.

cholesterol.title: Cholesterol Levels
cholesterol.subtitle: Distribution of total cholesterol in the NHANES sample.

diabetesAge.title: Diabetes by Age Groups
diabetesAge.subtitle: What proportion of people in each age group have diabetes (self-reported).
diabetesAge.note: Proportion calculated as percentage of participants with diabetes within the group.

obesityAge.title: Obesity by Age Groups
obesityAge.subtitle: Shows how the proportion of people with obesity changes across different age groups.

correlations.title: Factor Correlations
correlations.subtitle: How closely related the main indicators are to each other in the sample.
correlations.note: Values from -1 to 1: the closer to 1, the stronger the positive relationship between indicators.
correlations.empty: Insufficient data for all factors in this chart. Make sure all key indicators are present in the dataset.

historyTimeline.title: Prediction History
historyTimeline.subtitle: Dynamics of risk probabilities over time for your predictions.
historyTimeline.note: Lines show the change in risk probability for each target over time.
historyTimeline.empty: To see diagrams, first perform at least one prediction on the "Prediction Form" page.

charts.colorsNote: Colors indicate whether the indicator is within normal, warning, or risk zones.
charts.calculateMore: Calculate one more risk to see full comparison.
charts.comparisonNote: Once both risks are calculated, a comparison will appear here.

historyRiskDistribution.title: Distribution by Risk Categories
historyRiskDistribution.subtitle: Number of your predictions for each risk category for each target.
historyRiskDistribution.note: Shows how many predictions you made in each risk category.
historyRiskDistribution.empty: To see diagrams, first perform at least one prediction on the "Prediction Form" page.

historyModels.title: Used Models
historyModels.subtitle: Proportion of predictions made with different machine learning models.
historyModels.note: Chart shows which models you used most frequently.
historyModels.empty: To see diagrams, first perform at least one prediction on the "Prediction Form" page.

about.title: About system
about.subtitle: Automated health risk assessment and prediction system

whatIs.title: What is HealthRisk.AI?
whatIs.content: HealthRisk.AI is an automated system that helps assess health risks based on medical indicators.

purpose.title: Purpose
purpose.content: The system is created for educational and analytical purposes to help users understand their health risks.

notMedical.title: What the system does NOT do

howItWorks.title: How the system works
howItWorks.description: The system analyzes entered medical indicators and uses trained machine learning models to predict risks.

models.title: Machine Learning Models
models.description: The system uses calibrated machine learning models for accurate risk prediction.

aiAssistant.title: AI Assistant
aiAssistant.description: The AI assistant helps explain prediction results and provides personalized recommendations.

limitations.title: Important Limitations
limitations.educational: System for educational and analytical use
